Source.Name: perl-glib-object-introspection
Source.Summary: Glib::Object::Introspection - Dynamically create Perl language bindings
Source.Description: Glib::Object::Introspection uses the gobject-introspection and libffi projects to dynamically create Perl bindings for a wide variety of libraries. Examples include gtk+, webkit, libsoup and many more.
